name: Wikimon
tagline: Create an artificial intelligent pet that learns to chat through mirroring
body: **Overview** Wikimon is a Python script which creates an artificial intelligent digital pet that learns through mirroring. Users can chat with an fully-conversant artificial intelligent virtual friend that learns and imitates previous chats in context. Licensed under the MIT License - [https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) **Features** - Remembers conversation history, then learns by mirroring it - Works with any Linux operating system - Starts-up with an input of user's phone number - 3-step configuration wizard that requires less than 1 minute to set-up ---whatsapp buzzfeed Video --- **System Requirements** - Python 2.7 - These instructions have been tested on Ubuntu 14.04.3 and 15.10. ----------------------- **Wikimon Diagram** ----------------------- **Animated Tutorial**                               ----------------------- **Getting started**   First, install yowsup by following these steps: ``` $ git clone https://github.com/tgalal/yowsup.git && cd yowsup $ sudo apt-get install python-setuptools python-dev $ sudo python setup.py install $ cd .. ``` Register your phone number: ``` $ git checkout Android_2.12.440 $ sudo ./yowsup-cli registration --requestcode sms --phone --cc --mcc --mnc $ sudo ./yowsup-cli registration --register --phone --cc ``` For the \ and \ required by the two commands above, find them [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mobile_country_code). After registration, configure and run the server: ``` $ git clone https://github.com/facerecog/wikimon.git && cd wikimon $ sudo python setup.py install $ sudo python src/server.py ``` ----------------------- **Uninstall**   The following command will remove all the packages that Wikimonâ€™s `setup.py` automatically installs. Please read it carefully and run it at your own risk as other packages already on your system may require them. `$ sudo apt-get remove python-pip python-dev python-setuptools libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev espeak` ------------------------- **Support** If you want to support this project, please consider reaching out to me via muhd.amrullah@facerecog.asia ------------------------- Property of Facerecog Asia Pte.
